item.title: Emily add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "It is not the length of life, but the depth." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Emily add a quote by Confucious
item.description: "Everything has beauty, but not everyone sees it." -- Confucious

item.title: Emily add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "So many books, so little time." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Emily add a quote by Confucious
item.description: "Choose a job you love, and you will never have to work a day in your life." -- Confucious

item.title: Emily add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "The fool doth think he is wise, but the wise man knows himself to be a fool." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Emily add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "The person, be it gentleman or lady, who has not pleasure in a good novel, must be intolerably stupid." -- Jane Austen

item.title: Emily add a quote by Confucius
item.description: "If you make a mistake and do not correct it, this is called a mistake." -- Confucius

item.title: Emily add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "Be not afraid of greatness. Some are born great, some achieve greatness, and others have greatness thrust upon them." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Emily add a quote by J.K. Rowling
Emily add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "It takes a great deal of bravery to stand up to our enemies, but just as much to stand up to our friends." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Emily add a quote by Emily Dickinson
item.description: "That it will never come again is what makes life so sweet." -- Emily Dickinson

item.title: Emily add a quote by Robert Frost
item.description: "The best way out is always through." -- Robert Frost

item.title: Emily add a quote by Steve Martin
item.description: "A day without sunshine is like, you know, night." -- Steve Martin

item.title: Emily add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Be the change that you wish to see in the world." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Emily add a quote by Steve Martin
item.description: "It's pain that changes our lives." -- Steve Martin

item.title: Emily add a quote by Emily Dickinson
item.description: "If I read a book and it makes my whole body so cold no fire can warm me, I know that is poetry. If I feel physically as if the top of my head were taken off, I know that is poetry. These are the only ways I know it. Is there any other way?" -- Emily Dickinson

item.title: Emily add a quote by Jack London
item.description: "Life is not always a matter of holding good cards, but sometimes, playing a poor hand well." -- Jack London

item.title: Emily add a quote by Robert Frost
item.description: "In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on." -- Robert Frost

item.title: Emily add a quote by Robert Frost
item.description: "We love the things we love for what they are." -- Robert Frost

item.title: Emily add a quote by e.e. cummings
item.description: "To be nobody but yourself in a world which is doing its best day and night to make you like everybody else means to fight the hardest battle which any human being can fight and never stop fighting." -- e.e. cummings

item.title: Emily add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "Without ambition one starts nothing. Without work one finishes nothing. The prize will not be sent to you. You have to win it." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Emily add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Emily add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "No one can make you feel inferior without your consent." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Emily add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "Don't walk behind me; I may not lead. Don't walk in front of me; I may not follow. Just walk beside me and be my friend." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Emily add a quote by Mae West
item.description: "You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough." -- Mae West

item.title: Emily add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "I am so clever that sometimes I don't understand a single word of what I am saying." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Emily add a quote by Allen Saunders
item.description: "Life is what happens to you while you're busy making other plans." -- Allen Saunders

item.title: Emily add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "Darkness cannot drive out darkness: only light can do that. Hate cannot drive out hate: only love can do that." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Emily add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Emily add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "That which does not kill us makes us stronger." -- Friedrich Nietzsche
